short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that removes rounded edges off the entire Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I got fed up with today's incredibly lazy design philosophy of rounded edges on absolutely everything. So I countered with an extension that outright removes as many rounded edges as it can find, resulting in a much more structured, professional looking internet. 

It's also Open Source! https://github.com/ArkyonVeil/ObliterateCurves
